name: Transforming Beasts 3D
description:
Get yourself ready for action & thrill.

The secret medical mission went wrong giving birth to Huge Anaconda,Dino and Lion that can transform into Robot as well. People and other super natural humans are sent on mission to catch you. Can you escape and start a new peaceful life ?


Don't ponder for a minute and run for your life. There is no easy escape and you have to kill opponent to escape. Destroy buildings, throw vehicles and kill opponents to get maximum points through missions. Find your enemies and attack them rigorously. You have to fight with city heroes for your ultimate escape.

This game is specially designed on rampage pattern for maximum thrill & adventures. Its interesting missions will give you an amazing experience of anaconda snake robot. Use your weapons wisely to kill giant rivals.Its interesting gameplay and rampage missions assure that you will never get bored and will play again & again.

Are you ready for worse city battle adventures?

Features:
• Awesome 3D city environment to explore
• Realistic visual & sounds effects
• Intuitive & Addictive gameplay
• Missions based game for maximum thrill
• Challenging Missions to complete in modern city environment.

Download & Play the Best Transforming Robots Simulator Now!
